entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make Type.IsPrimitive a JIT intrinsic (and JIT time constant) #95929
  • Enable Remaining Libraries Tests in TestReadyToRun Pipeline #95928
    9.0.0
  • Large unmanaged memory growth (leak?) when upgrading from .NET 6 to 8 #95922
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Limit PNSE in `HybridGlobalization` #95921
  • FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart, FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart, FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart are not set in NET8 #95919
  • [API Proposal]: Make ZipArchiveEntry.CompressionMethod public #95909
  • Add public copy constructors for HTTP header collections #95912
  • [API Proposal]: Support of secured value decryption configuration options #95899
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 12/7/2023 9:32:35 PM #95926
  • Allow specifying `JsonConverter` attribute annotations on properties of unsupported type. #95893
    Future
  • .Net 7/8 failed to fork process at Linux #95890
  • Failures in x86 coreclr pgostress #95887
  • Reachable assert in ECDiffieHellmanCng #95886
    9.0.0
  • Split Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration API surface and interop source generator API surface into more assemblies #95885
  • [RFC] Is ```System.StringComparer.Compare(object? x, object? y)``` Implemented Correctly? #95884
  • Generate strings instead of Roslyn SyntaxNodes in interop source generators #95882

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: An extension method similar to "enumerate" or "withIndex" in other languages #78156
  • .NET Breaking Change - ActivatorUtilitiesConstructorAttribute doesn't work after upgrade to .NET 8 #95915
  • Trimmer/AOT compiler issues warnings but they are not shown and publish is successful. #95932
  • Tracing for dynamic assembly loading? #12743
    Future
  • A way to know if a method is overridden #12760
    Future
  • net9.0-ios-Release-arm64-NativeAOT_Release-OSX.13.Amd64.Iphone.Open leg failing without running tests #95875
  • Current EventPipe asserts on StackFrameIterator when collecting gcdumps from nativeAOT apps #95599
    9.0.0
  • Current EventPipe asserts on StackFrameIterator when collecting tracing from nativeAOT apps #95606
    9.0.0
  • [iOS] CultureInfo.DisplayName only shows abbreviation #95427
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Create an optional job for HybridGlobalization on CI #95282
  • [mono][wasi] add ilgen component tasks to wasi #95874
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.cmd #95843
  • Checked/Release asm diffs failure: Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupIsa(intrin.id))' #95081
    9.0.0
  • 9 Regressions in PerfLabTests.GetMember #93741
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Tasks: Delete temp files #95938
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] More filtering in EnumGcRefConservatively #95937
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add EventBuilder implementation #95936
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [NativeAOT] Delete unused class DirectPInvokePolicy #95935
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Compute new dominators earlier and invalidate old dominators #95925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • macOS: Set certificate as a dependency of private key handles #95924
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Use `ArrayStack` instead of linked list for loop work list #95923
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CX_4A group #95918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Further clean up loop alignment placement #95917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix 16 byte stack alignment in asm helpers. #95916
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT/Apple] Map the thunks using vm_allocate/vm_remap #95914
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Sockets: update tests for Linux 6.6 fix. #95913
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasi] Add build support for using `wasm-opt` #95900
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #95898
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Use workstation GC in outerloop NativeAOT libs runs #95896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot]use string interpolation when generating c #95894
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [GC] Reduce volatility in DATAS heap count adjustments #95888
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Add newer container for performance Android testing #95883
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "Build tests as self-contained for native AOT" #95880
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix some BBF_NONE_QUIRK cases #95931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix BBJ_COND-related assert in OptIfConversionDsc::IfConvertDump #95934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update BasicBlock flag dumping in `dspFlags` #95930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] rename WasmApp.* to BrowserWasmApp.* #95892
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump #95816
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix assert in BaseBucketParamsManager #95911
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [tests] Disables tests on Apple mobile platforms #95861
    Servicing-approved, os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Move some runtime code to a separate runtime.h/runtime.c… #95834
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish" #95881
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [doc] HybridGlobalization, add not supported APIs #95920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Invalidate loop table after unrolling and dominators after MarkLocalVars #95854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add Vector128.EqualsAny simd intrinsic #95901
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization fix localized DisplayName and LanguageName #95786
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Enable ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics thread to be walked by the GC #95837
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [mono][wasi] Remove some obsolete #ifdef-ed code. #95889
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Minimal legacy support for Blazor renderBatch #95869
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable finalizer thread, run most tests in threadpool #95783
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix OSR DFS assert, and update entry BB for try regions #95871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix runtime-wasm-perf failing on PRs #95895
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: clear loop iter info after rebuilding loops for opt repeat #95879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use 'compOpportunisticallyDependsOn' to determine if we can use ArmBase_Arm64_MultiplyLongAdd/MultiplyLongSub/MultiplyLongNeg intrinsics in lowering #95877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder (#93115)" #95872
    area-System.Reflection

Updated

  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasm in release build #95502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Remove loop-related VN quirks #95729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide More Detailed Information in System.TypeLoadException for Incorrect MethodImplAttribute Marking #95833
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix null reference exception in ilverify #94988
    area-Tools-ILVerification
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Build fixes for Bionic on x64 #95382
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve the hash function used in the `InstMethodHashTable` #95285
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.71, windows: 120.0.6099.71 #95832
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Update the place where we assert about `align` presence while removing jump to next instr #95845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [browser][mt] dynamic thread create #95702
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • WIP: Testing iOS library mode with NativeAOT on CI #94999
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
